Module overrungl.opengl
Package overrungl.opengl.ext.arb

Class GLARBFragmentProgram

java.lang.Object
overrungl.opengl.ext.arb.GLARBFragmentProgram
public final class GLARBFragmentProgram extends Object
GLARBFragmentProgram relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • GLARBFragmentProgram refers to one or more preview APIs: MemorySegment, SegmentAllocator.
Programs can only use GLARBFragmentProgram when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
GL_ARB_fragment_program
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
squid233
